pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:6.1.26: “The five month period” is the last month of the rainy season plus the four months of the cold season.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:6.3.11: [Sp.2.302](): _Bhattiyagharanti nimantitagharaṃ vā salākabhattādidāyakānaṃ vā gharaṃ_, “Bhattiyaghara: the house where he has been invited or the house of donors of a meal drawn by lots, etc.”
